title: Find Wild Coffee
description: Geolocation web app that helps users discover independent caf√©s by integrating public APIs, data automation, and clean UX design. Built to solve the problem of finding quality local coffee shops in an age of chain dominance.

title: Data Product Framework
description: Published framework for understanding and evaluating Data Product Owners, featured on Fivetran's blog. Established best practices for product ownership in modern data teams across analytics engineering roles.

title: Prioritizing Data Team Projects
description: Strategic guide for data leaders on making effective prioritization decisions. Published on Montreal Analytics blog, covering key questions to ask when evaluating data team projects and ensuring alignment with business objectives.

title: UFL Data Platform
description: Led the implementation of a unified data platform for the United Football League, enabling real-time analytics and business intelligence across operations. Delivered measurable improvements in data accessibility and decision-making speed.
